stories.text:
Hoping someone can tell me about what it takes to become a professional baker.

Did you go to school for it or learn on the job?

What is the job market like?

Do you consider it a good career?
stories.title: Ask HN: Is Anyone Here a Professional Baker?

stories.text: I feel like I'm hyper-aware of little details in most aspects of life and it's a negative in some ways. If this also happens to you, how do you deal with it?
stories.title: Ask HN: Can I or should I be less aware of things?
War, founding startup, crypto withdrawal fees and total craziness around

stories.text:
I just wasted a few hours upgrading to Ubuntu 21.10 and experiencing filesystem corruption on my ZFS filesystem.

I also experienced filesystem corruption after a fresh installation of Ubuntu 21.10 with ZFS.

It turns out there is a known issue with ZFS on Ubuntu 21.10 mentioned in the long release notes. I thought I would draw attention to it to save other people time and prevent losing data.
stories.title: Tell HN: Ubuntu 21.10 is currently broken when using ZFS
